europeana:record.dc:title: The Holarctic genus Anisocyrta Foerster (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Alysiinae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Achterberg, van C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Braconidae; Alysiinae; Alysiini; Anisocyrta; key; distribution; Holartic
europeana:record.dc:description: The genus Anisocyrta Foerster, 1862 (Braconidae; Alysiinae: Alysiini) is revised and three new species are described: Anisocyrta microchora spec. nov. from Sweden, A. alpinicola spec. nov. from Central Europe, and A. nearctica spec. nov. from Canada and the U.S.A. Anisocyrta longicauda Tobias, 1962 is a new junior synonym of A. perdita (Haliday, 1838). The species are keyed and partly illustrated.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: The Holarctic genus Anisocyrta Foerster (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Alysiinae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 60) (Issue 20)
